articles.author: Catherine Lewis
articles.title: The first Nintendo emulator to land on the App Store and stick following an Apple rule change plays DS, GBA, N64 games for free - Gamesradar
articles.description: Plus Game Boy Color, SNES, and more
articles.content: A free retro Nintendo game emulator is now live on the Apple App Store, and because of recent changes made to Apple's app review guidelines, it's actually permitted to be on there. Whether Nintendo w… [+2930 chars]
